page.title: 18EATING & FASHION IN SOUTHSEA
page.content: As a holiday resort there are many {restaurants}in Southsea. They range from{hot bread shops}to{oriental food. There are any foreign food places including{Indian,Chinese,Middle {Eastern,French,Italian and Mexican. {Hamburger}houses and the traditional {fish and chip}shops are around many corners. There is a{creperie, indicating a link with Brittany, and {wholefood restaurants. Foodshops range from major supermarket stores to seven-day late opening grocery shops run by Indian or Pakistani owners.Fashion shops in Southsea centre around{Palmerston Road and{Marmion Road}area, where clothes are very expensive. There are many {hairdressers,}most of which offer other beauty treatments, such as manicures, facials,slimming machines and sun-tanning machines.
